Packaged!

12 Apr 2007 I packaged the versioning and backup scripts (and the icons) and created a private repository.

http://www.singularity.be/ubuntu/

I consider phase 2 finished, but I still have to document it.
Phase 1 (EncFS) should also be crafted into a package so I can install and maintain it easily. But this is not as easy as it sounds. When implementing phase 1 manually, I had to log out of my account and move files around quite often. That's not something that can be done in a package...
